thread.section_title: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. | www.blumberg.com
thread.title: Mike M.
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by Mike M.

author: Mike M.
title: Mike M.
text: The order arrived a day or two earlier than I expected and the printing was exactly how I typed it. They included a "test stamp" so I can verify that it was done correctly. They gave clear instructions on how to install the plates. My only regret is that it wasn't clear how to take the plates out, however I'm sure a simple phone call or email would suffice, when that time comes. Thanks again!!
